column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Mako says : " Whoever paid the Triple Threats stole everything . "
#Text=Asami says : " I 'm ruined .
#Text=Maybe they did n't have time to hit them all .
#Text=" Asami says : " You do n't understand .
#Text=Everything I had was in here .
#Text=" Mako says : " We have to search the place for evidence .
#Text=If we can find a lead ... " Asami says : " Mako ... it does n't matter anymore .
#Text=" Mako says : " I can figure this out .
#Text=" Asami says : " Just stop .
#Text=It 's over .
#Text=I give up .
#Text=" Mako says : " Well , I 'm not giving up on you .
#Text=" Asami says : " Sorry , I - " Mako says : " Uh ... It 's - it 's okay .
#Text=Um ... Anyway ... I got ta run .
#Text=I 'm gon na find out who did this .
#Text=And I know just who to ask .
#Text="
